name: Dodge The Creeps! (SimpingTuna)
description:
Dodge the Creeps is the game to those who love arcade games that leave you wanting to beat your previous score, and having a tons of fun.

Instructions: Use keyboard arrows to move the Player.

Music - by me (Simping Tuna) Please do not reuse my music.

Hi, I am Simping Tuna and this is my Second Game made with Godot, from the Godot Documentation. Thank you for playing!

Please encourage me by commenting below. Your comments are really appreciated!
